圠字的基本解释

圠
yà
山弯曲的地方。
土地板结。

圠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yà］
［《廣韻》烏黠切，入黠，影。］
(1)山曲。
(2)见“坱圠”。

圠字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　圠； 康熙笔画：4； 页码：页223第02
【廣韻】烏黠切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】乙黠切，?音軋。【六書故】土密凝也。【揚子·方言】坱圠，不測也。【賈誼·鵩賦】大鈞播物，坱圠無垠。【註】坱圠，冲融無迹也。【史記】鈞作專，播作槃。【漢書】坱圠作坱軋。【揚雄·甘泉賦】作軮軋。【應劭曰】其氣坱圠，非有限齊也。又【淮南·招隱士】坱兮圠山曲?。【註】?亦曲也。○按諸韻書訓圠爲山曲，誤。

圠字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
圠字的起名意思

暂无。

圠
Basic explanation of words
圠
yà
Where the mountain bends.
The land is compacted.
圠
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yà］
["Guangyun" black-point cut, into the point, shadow. ]
(1) Mountain song.
(2) See "坱圠".
圠
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [The Ministry of Soil Characters] 　圠; Kangxi Strokes: 4; Page Number: Page 223 02
[Guang Yun] Wu Fu cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Yi Fu cut,? Sound rolling. 【The Six Books】The soil is also dense. [Yangtze Dialect] Tuoqi, unexpected. [Jia Yi·Fu] Dajun broadcast material, 坱圠 endless. [Note] Tuoqi, there is no trace of fusion. [Historical Records] Jun as special, broadcast as Pan. [Hanshu] Tuoqi is made of Tuoqi. 【Yang Xiong·Ganquan Fu】It is used as a garland. [Ying Shao said] Its gas is not limited. Also [Huainan·Recruiting Hermits] 坱xi圠山曲?. [Note]? Yiqu also. ○According to the precepts of various rhyme books, it is a mountain song, which is wrong.
